title: Restricted Micro-Site
description: Cookie-cutter micro-site where users can only edit page content with limited block types

items.title: Home
items.description: Welcome to our micro-site. This content can be edited, but the site structure is locked.
items.content:
Welcome to our micro-site. This content can be edited, but the site structure is locked.

You can only add video and image content to pages.
